This cookbook provides some recipes for Nagios setup.

## Requirements

None.

## Usage

### nagios-grid::default
- does nothing.

### nagios-grid::nagios-base
- Nagios base installation.

### nagios-grid::nagios-nrpe-server
- installs Nagios NRPE Server.
